# Tabs Component

### Tabs

**Exports:**
- `Tabs` - Tabs component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Tabs } from 'kampsy-ui';

	let selected = $state('apple');
</script>

<Tabs
	bind:selected
	tabs={[
		{ title: 'Apple', value: 'apple' },
		{ title: 'Orange', value: 'orange' },
		{ title: 'Mango', value: 'mango' }
	]}
/>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/tabs for full documentation and examples.
